formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: mL = tsp × teaspoon_size_mL For US teaspoon: mL = tsp × 4.92892 For metric teaspoon: mL = tsp × 5 For UK teaspoon: mL = tsp × 5.91939
